short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take timestamped notes on YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Notes - Take Time-Stamped Notes While Watching Videos

Enhance your YouTube viewing experience with YouTube Notes, a seamless note-taking solution that lets you capture thoughts and insights while watching videos.

Key Features:
• Create time-stamped notes that sync with video playback
• Click on timestamps to jump to specific moments in the video
• Search through your notes to find key points
• Visual markers on the video progress bar show where notes were taken
• Dark mode support for comfortable viewing
• Auto-pause feature when typing notes (customizable)
• Copy and share formatted notes with video timestamps
• Notes are saved per video and persist between sessions

Perfect for:
• Students taking lecture notes
• Researchers collecting video references
• Content creators organizing feedback
• Anyone who wants to remember key moments in videos

Your notes are stored locally on your device for privacy. Simple, intuitive, and designed to enhance your YouTube learning experience.

Get started by clicking the notes icon next to any YouTube video!
